name: CAN Message Generator Command
description: CAN Message Generator Command generates CAN messages.

indexedParameters.name: driveSessionTime
indexedParameters.description: The drive session emulation time for running the message generator.

namedParameters.name: messagesFrequencies
namedParameters.description: The names of the messages and their frequencies in Hz.
